name: peoplebooster
description: PeopleBooster - HR SaaS Platform for personality assessment and ATS

scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:shell:postgres: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d peoplebooster
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:reset: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.db:generate: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma generate
scripts.db:seed: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.db:push: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma db push
scripts.db:pull: docker-compose exec backend npx prisma db pull
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env.local
